anns.exact: Our study also provides insight into the possible molecular basis responsible for the high MPA resistance of IMPDH-B. In particular, we identified one amino acid residue, which is completely conserved in all previously identified IMPDHs, but which is different in the members of the group belonging to the type IMPDH-B. On the applied front, the identified genetic basis for self-resistance may help in efficient production of MPA in heterologous hosts and in understanding the MPA-related chemical ecology in filamentous fungi.

tags.postfix: in filamentous fungi.

anns.exact: The high level of resistance observed for IMPDH-B encoded by mpaF from P. brevicompactum is intriguing and stands as the strongest MPA tolerance reported for a eukaryotic IMPDH.

tags.name: resistance
tags.prefix: The high level of
tags.postfix: observed for IMPDH-B encoded by mpaF from P. brevicompactum is intriguing and stands as the strongest MPA tolerance reported for a eukaryotic IMPDH.

anns.exact: Our study also provides insight into the possible molecular basis responsible for the high MPA resistance of IMPDH-B. In particular, we identified one amino acid residue, which is completely conserved in all previously identified IMPDHs, but which is different in the members of the group belonging to the type IMPDH-B. On the applied front, the identified genetic basis for self-resistance may help in efficient production of MPA in heterologous hosts and in understanding the MPA-related chemical ecology in filamentous fungi.
